title: Why Do People Use WhatsApp? Everything You Need to Know

steps.title: WhatsApp is one of the most used messaging apps in the world.
steps.content: WhatsApp is one of the most used messaging apps in the world. It is especially prominent in Europe, India, and other parts of the globe. While WhatsApp may not be as omnipresent in the U.S., it's a vital app for anybody who wants to text or call family and friends abroad without paying international charges. Likewise, if you are traveling abroad, WhatsApp is a great way to keep communicating with your contacts your home country while avoiding the international charges that come with most mobile plans.

steps.title: WhatsApp offers greater security and privacy than SMS.
steps.content: WhatsApp offers greater security and privacy than SMS. WhatsApp's end-to-end encryption is one of its most noteworthy features, as many people trust it over traditional SMS. Only a few other apps (Signal being one of them) can offer similar online safety to its users.

steps.title: You can use WhatsApp to send messages and make calls over Wi-Fi.
steps.content: You can use WhatsApp to send messages and make calls over Wi-Fi. Making a traditional phone call often requires a data plan, but with WhatsApp, you can call and message others without any data connection at all. A simple Wi-Fi connection will suffice.

steps.title: Take advantage of everything WhatsApp has to offer at no cost.
steps.content: Take advantage of everything WhatsApp has to offer at no cost. WhatsApp is completely free, which is partly why it is so popular all around the world. You can use WhatsApp to text, voice chat , and video chat without paying hefty fees.

steps.title: WhatsApp group chats
steps.content: WhatsApp group chats can include more people than most texting plans. SMS group chats can include up to 10 people, and even iMessage can only support up to 32. WhatsApp supports a whopping 256 members in a single group chat. This feature allows many users to create mass groups revolving around common interests or identities. You can build a group chat with you and your entire extended family, or one dedicated to fans of a sports team!

steps.title: WhatsApp makes it easy to send out a mass text to your contacts.
steps.content: WhatsApp makes it easy to send out a mass text to your contacts. The Broadcast feature on WhatsApp allows you to blast a message out to as many of your contacts as you would like all at once. This wikiHow article can help you send a Broadcast message on WhatsApp.

steps.title: WhatsApp is more than just a reliable texting app.
steps.content: WhatsApp is more than just a reliable texting app. WhatsApp may be primarily used for text messaging , but its features could replace even more of your phone's core functions! With WhatsApp, you can make audio and video calls to any of your WhatsApp contacts. WhatsApp is owned by Meta (Facebook), so the same technology powers video calls on both WhatsApp and Facebook Messenger.

steps.title: Monitor whether your texts have been sent or read on WhatsApp.
steps.content: Monitor whether your texts have been sent or read on WhatsApp. Unlike SMS texting, which doesn't allow you to see whether your text has been read, WhatsApp displays the status of your messages for each of your conversations.

steps.title: Express yourself to your contacts with a unique WhatsApp profile.
steps.content: Express yourself to your contacts with a unique WhatsApp profile. WhatsApp users can write a fun bio and add a profile picture that will be visible to their contacts. The app therefore sits somewhere between a messaging and a social media app, making it a more welcoming environment for its users.

steps.title: Update your WhatsApp status
steps.content: Update your WhatsApp status to keep your contacts in the loop. WhatsApp statuses allow users to communicate their thoughts to their contacts, or to let their contacts know if they are busy/unavailable.

steps.title: WhatsApp Business offers unique metrics for business owners.
steps.content: WhatsApp Business offers unique metrics for business owners. Many small businesses use WhatsApp Business to communicate with their customers. A WhatsApp Business account also provides insights for these businesses, allowing them to track their communications and growth. [1] X Research source WhatsApp Business users can also carry out e-commerce transactions directly via the app.

steps.title: You can access WhatsApp in a web browser on your PC or Mac.
steps.content: You can access WhatsApp in a web browser on your PC or Mac. Open WhatsApp Web in a tab in your internet browser, and start texting directly from your computer. All you have to do is quickly link your devices. [2] X Research source

steps.title: Unsend regrettable messages with a few simple taps.
steps.content: Unsend regrettable messages with a few simple taps. If you send a text on WhatsApp by mistake, or simply want to correct a typo, you can easily unsend messages in the app. It is impossible to unsend SMS texts. [3] X Research source

steps.title: Store your entire WhatsApp history by backing up your chats.
steps.content: Store your entire WhatsApp history by backing up your chats. WhatsApp automatically backs up your texts for you, and you can access these text logs with any file manager app. You can also disable this feature in the app's Settings if you are not interested in a backup. [4] X Research source

steps.title: Bold, italicize, and strikethrough your text with WhatsApp's unique formatting.
steps.content: Bold, italicize, and strikethrough your text with WhatsApp's unique formatting. WhatsApp users can more fully express themselves by customizing the appearance of their text and stylizing it as needed. [5] X Research source

steps.title: You can attach documents to WhatsApp messages.
steps.content: You can attach documents to WhatsApp messages. WhatsApp allows you to attach photos and videos like you can with most messaging services, but it sets itself apart by making the attachment of files just as easy! Share documents with your contacts without having to rely on email or other document sharing systems. [6] X Research source

steps.title: WhatsApp includes several unique message attachments.
steps.content: WhatsApp includes several unique message attachments. Use a poll to gauge a group's interest in various options or share your live location with someone who is trying to find where you are. You can also send a static location if you do not want someone to be able to track you.
